website_summaries.verdict: Simple to operate grabber with a soft and grippable tip, ensuring a sure grip on objects.
pros: Provides a lot of flexibility for grabbing both low and high objects
Cushioned tips on the jaw give a sure grip
Head will rotate 90 degrees to make it easier to grab objects in tight spaces
cons: Stress points of interior wire and trigger may not last very long

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful design, but the rotating joint just behind the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful design, but the rotating joint just behind the front fork is to weak. The first time I tried to pick up a pair of pants on the floor and was applying a small amount of pressure to get under the material, the whole joint snap. Until this is fixed I wouldn't recommend anyone wasting their money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert James

customer_reviews.title: Weak design - All units will break easily in the same point
customer_reviews.text: Bad design. Both Grabbers were broken on arrival. It was not shipping damage, but rather a weak spot in the design of the rotating head where they glue the assembly together at the rotating head. I returned and will find a better engineered product, this one is not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Melugin

customer_reviews.title: Love This Grabber
customer_reviews.text: Due to a current medical condition, I am unable to bend over to pick items up off the floor. I got this grabber and hoped it would assist me with little everyday tasks like picking up dog toys, laundry, dog dishes, items accidentally dropped, etc. Let me tell you, this has been a life saver. Not only am i able to pick up those things and more but I am truly amazed at how wonderful this simple item is. I've picked up pieces of paper and, unbelievably, lint and even a tiny scrap of cellophane that I noticed on the carpet. This grabber is exactly what I needed and I'm so glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good "arm extender".
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it to grab paper towels stored on top of laundry room cabinets. Much better than either waiting for me or climbing onto a step stool. Well made. Does the job. (I'm referring to the grabber, not my wife).
customer_reviews.author: Glennm

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing broke recently. I had it about three months, probably used it about 30 times and then it broke. I had my prior one about 5 years. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Noland

customer_reviews.title: Works best of any i have had so far
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth kind i have tried and the best of them. I did test picking a nickel from the hardwood floor and it worked. my Others can not. Seems sturdy enough and grabs cans and other light household items. I like the rotating end. Less then 20 dollars and i will by another if this one holds up to the beating i will put it through. It looks on line i would have to spend a lot more to get any better model.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: 6 months of light use. Then broke for no reason. A little upset because refund window is closed.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product for six months and then the cable or swivel head broke. That is why I'm giving it a 3 out of 5 stars instead of 5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. (I lost one.) This is the only unit like this I can use to pick up 20 oz cans from the top shelf in my kitchen. This is much less expensive than a ladder and takes up less space. None of the others would have been safe enough and would have fallen down. Strong aluminum shaft, strong grippers with rubber foam. It also allows you to swivel the head at 90 degrees. And much less expensive than ones that are half as strong! The handle has nice ergonomics so my hand doesn't get so tired. If it folded, I would give it 7 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ryq, Tilter at Windmills

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This reacher is very helpful to me with scolious and arthritic knees. Sitting of standing I can reach for and grab things that I would normally have get out of my chair to get or bend over to pick up. I can also turn on or off lights and many other uses. It is a real gift.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but short-lived.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has poor knees and can't bend over easily. This did the trick for picking things up - It was easy to get a hang of and gripped most things really well! Unfortunately if you put even the slightest bit of pressure on it to pick up something stubborn or to push something into place, the plastic might snap on you. So, we'll probably be looking for something a little more heavy duty for next time!
customer_reviews.author: Eth

customer_reviews.title: Great dexterity
customer_reviews.text: The RMS "grabber" offers great dexterity with an almost gentle touch offered by the soft plastic ends of the claw. The ability to turn the head 90 degrees is very handy and allows you to pick up cylindrical objects without tilting your hand. On the negative side, the soft ends of the claw are at time too soft and will not allow a firm grip on some heavy flat items. For most uses it is very good and I use it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Coast Dog

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This “grabber” has been very helpful. It’s light weight, has a good grip and the yellow make it easier to find when you forget to put it away. I can’t lean over very much and am fairly short so I have used this to pick up things from the floor as well as grabbing things beyond my reach. Not something you’re likely to use every minute but we’ll worth the price
customer_reviews.author: LostinSouthBama

customer_reviews.title: Really like it - picks up coins fairly easily!
customer_reviews.text: We have several different grabbers in our house (what can I say - we are getting old and stiff!) but I like this one a lot. It is very good at picking up coins which the other grabbers don't do as well, and the bright yellow (in our case - you can get difference colors) on the body of the grabber makes it easy to spot. I also like the broader tip/grip at the bottom, which I think is easier to use than the grabbers that have a "pinch" end. I would highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnsman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as they stated. Works great, head turns with no trouble, nice bright color. 4 stars because it's not as heavy duty as I'd expected. Perfect for lighter objects like remote, phone, etc... It will be very handy after upcoming shoulder surgery!
customer_reviews.author: shellyscorpio

customer_reviews.title: The long and short of it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 19" RMS first for picking up, from my wheelchair, things that fall onto the floor. The 32" RMS is excellent for selecting cooking-seasonings from the upper cabinet shelves while cooking ( Yeah! I'm an excellent cook ). Thank You for Your GREAT Engineering; both of these items have lengthened my arms. Respectfully, KSH
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: Great for short people
customer_reviews.text: I love this grabber. The rubber covered tips make grabbing jars and glasses safe. I had another grabber with magnetic tips and had a difficult time grasping items from my cabinets. This one works nicely. The only thing I wish it had was a hole to put a string through for hanging it from a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridaz

customer_reviews.title: I would recomend buying it for lite use
customer_reviews.text: holds lite products well up to a jar of sauce , any more weight then that and you risk dropping it , if you have to turn the grips you have to PULL on the fingered grip before turning it or you risk breaking it . I use it for picking up trash in the yard or clothing on the floor and glasses up high on a shelf
customer_reviews.author: Joey De

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple device and works like it should. My wife is shorter than me and sometimes can't reach things and she uses it. I have a music recording deck and can't reach wires in the back that I need to reach. This also works well for snagging whichever wire I want so I don't have to crawl under my recording table. I would buy this again. I was concerned it would be too long. The longer wand turned out to be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome P.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be OK
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's me (being stupid), or it should possibly come with a brief explanation of how it rotates. I am unable to get mine to rotate. Can't do it, tried so many times; will use as a gripper only. My need for rotation of the gripper will have to be unattainable. I'll get over it!!
customer_reviews.author: Feather Baby Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my riding mower to help pick up loose trash and debris that I missed before getting out the mower. I wish it was just a few inches longer as I'm pretty tall, but it picks up great. For reference, it can pick up a paperclip off my office floor but cannot handle picking up the weight of a gallon of milk.
customer_reviews.author: Lphickey26

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market for us Para's.
customer_reviews.text: I've been in a wheelchair for 9 years. Could not ask for a better set of hands. Highly recommend for those who are para's. If you're like me I drop things at least 10 to 15 times a day. I've tried all the others out there and nothing comes even close to these. I can pickup a baseball card laying flat on the ground!!! That's amazing in itself. Paul
customer_reviews.author: Luap

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pick up well
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this for light things off the shelves...but it doesn't grip well at all... no matter how tight you hold on items slip off.. very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: C. T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Gimme that!
customer_reviews.text: Why is is so hard for kids to pick things up? Don't they understand that mom has serious spine issues? And don't get me started on the adults coming though this house. So if I have to do everything myself at least I won't be bent over in pain as often. Grabby grabber grabs the grubby grippy things on the ground and all around.
customer_reviews.author: Arroxane

customer_reviews.title: Item broke, not even 6 months old
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item in July of 2018 used daily to help with getting dressed but not heavy use. Have been using a walker and most recently had hip surgery, was going to reach for a light item today and wire in handle is frayed and is not working properly. I know I am past the return deadline but was wondering if seller could help with purchase of an additional item thank you
customer_reviews.author: jbar

customer_reviews.title: A Must-have after Knee Surgery
customer_reviews.text: This reacher was very helpful for my husband after his recent knee replacement surgery. For the first couple of weeks, he had to keep his leg elevated, and he liked the independence of reaching and picking things up without asking for help. It really works for picking up shoes, newspapers, phone, anything beyond reach.
customer_reviews.author: Pchlee

customer_reviews.title: Great gripping power
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review and got it confused with another product I purchased the other one was foldable and that was so so and that review got in place of this product. This grabber is a 5 star it can pick up soup cans with ease from a top shelf without dropping them. It gripped well. Very happy would recommend. Sorry for the mix up
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy pull handle & nylon grabber. I have arthritis and it’s perfect for not only reaching items in high cabinets but also picking up small branches in my yard. I’ve purchased 2 different size lengths & given some away as gifts. Great buy !!
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Payne

customer_reviews.title: A handy device!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the grabber because my Mom and I are pretty short. Although, the grabber can't handle heavy items, such as removing a full bottle of wind-ex off a shelf, it's great for just about everything else. Boxes of baggies, paper towels, and half full bottles of wind-ex. The gripper fingers worked like charm to remove pushpins embedded in the ceiling after a birthday party; it can pick items off the floor while you remain sitting. We love this item and use it pretty much daily.
customer_reviews.author: PAM T

customer_reviews.title: Glad these were invented!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior with arthritis and bending problems, and these have made my life so much easier! Quality of life is Everything, and these reachers help me pick up things around the house so easily, from dropped socks to bits of paper to dog pads to a penny! Got 3 different colors, one for each level of home! A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieBelle'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful device
customer_reviews.text: This was a great help last spring when I damaged my knee and had difficulty getting up and down from the floor. Also helpful for reaching objects in awkward places like behind the sofa or dresser. Strong enough for what I've needed it to do
customer_reviews.author: James T Laux

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone with back, arthritis, or just age problems that keep us from reaching the floor easily. I had hip joint replacement surgeries this year. One restriction was no picking things up from the floor. The grabber picked up everything from my purse to the occasional pill! I got 2 more just to have them in more rooms of the house. Thank you... this saved my sanity while recovering!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Marr

customer_reviews.title: Excelent value grabber. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for valve. It works great in the kitchen. I have used it to place and retrieve mason jars at the top shelves and pick up a seed from the floor. Also kids like to borrow it for shenanigans. The grabber feels solid and strong enough. RMS San Antonio did it right.
customer_reviews.author: F. Bombe

customer_reviews.title: the easy of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Handi Grip Reacher as a gift for a friend. Previously, my friend used a gripper he had purchased from Walmart. The Walmart gripper broke after a few weeks of use and could not be repaired. Even though the Handi Grip Reacher was more expensive, my friend said the quality of the product is very real. He commented that the construction, the easy of use, and the features were real positives.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff from California

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and durable.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to pick up trash along the road and at parks. Very easy to use. Very durable. The rotating head also helps when needing to get things off the top shelf in the garage!
customer_reviews.author: w106bmb

customer_reviews.title: This grabber is well made, light weight and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: My wife really loves this grabber, she hurt her back and has pain when she bends over. So this grabber is a back saver. She purchased 3 other grabbers that didn’t quite pick up small things easily or was heavy or hard to close the grabber. This one is relatively light, easy to operate and can pickup small and medium size items.
customer_reviews.author: rky

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: This grabber - reacher has been working fine. I had my doubts because Ive had one, and it was not sturdy. I have a cast right now and I cant bend to pick up anything, so this has been of great help. I absolutely recommend this, it will make your life eaSIER.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita Labat Stover

customer_reviews.title: One of my best grabbers for the price it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: Listen Grabber is pretty sturdy and heavy duty... You're not going to pick up a 5 lb bag of sugar, but you can pretty much grab small canned goods without dropping them... This is the second one I purchased as I bought another win for a gift... You can pick a dime up off of the floor
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Lawn care  business essential ( for me anyway!)
customer_reviews.text: I operate a lawn care business and have used several different brands of grabbers , looking for the toughest one. This one seems to be lasting the longest and holding up very well. I have one on each mower to pick up garbage off lawns . I can pick up anything from a coin to rocks . The only reason I have for replacing from time to time is caused by human error . Thanks for making a stronger, tougher grabber!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McRae

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend product for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a huge part of my daily living. I'm only 50 but I have hip, knee and back problems. I use this all the time to pick up things I drop. It is so versatile it can pick up something as small and light as a scrap of paper and as heavy as one of my sneakers with an insert which makes it a bit heavy. The gripper is easy to use and the head position can be switched quickly and smoothly. Ordering was easy. It came fast and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Ramsdell

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Hi :-) I've purchased 3 of these grabbers, andf I find them very useful for picking up paper and lightweight items. But they don't do well with heavier items or anything that puts any pressure on it whatsoever, as they will snap like a twig at the joint above the grabber. All of mine snapped in the same place, and I've learned to get some use out of them as the grabber part just dangles towards the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable strength
customer_reviews.text: Amazing strong. Love that you can rotate. Use it to reach gallon bottle of laundry detergent and it doesn't flinch. Rubber lining really holds the bottle. Precise enough to grab a single clothes hanger. Invaluable for me.
customer_reviews.author: kathleencarter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Item!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two grabbers from Publishers Clearing House a month ago. They were crap!!! I then purchased a grabber from this company and it is amazing! I couldn't be more satisfied with this product. It even comes with a warranty. Amazing! If you are looking for a grabber look no further. But one from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Laushey

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful to avoid post-surgical bending
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for me since I recently had surgery and I’m restricted from bending. This allows me to pick up many things without needing to rely on others to help me with everything. It really does a great job and it has been very helpful to me for the specific purpose that I intended it for when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mezzanine Daze

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for reaching and grabbing.
customer_reviews.text: Great for anywhere in the house for us short folks. I have several and love the ability to adjust the pinchers so it can go flat to reach under furniture. Well made and easy to maneuver. Great for getting my cat's toys from behind furniture too.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki of CA

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable tool
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me one in green more than a year ago. I bought 2 of these as gifto. I have emails one reacher in my kitchen to play every and retrieve items on high shelves also to pick up food particles I drop on floor. I have one in my laundry room to take clothes out of dryer (much cheaper than buying a platform) especially the clothes at the back of the drum. I alook have one in my close the white house has 10 foot ceilings. This is an invaluable tool for retrieving things that fall into tight spaces or under bed, etc.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A must have for everyone! And great quality as well.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful tool for everyday tasks. Easily picks up larger items as well as smaller items with ease. I ordered two of these for my mother, for daily convenience. She put one in her jewelry room where she spends much of her time making jewelry. To my surprise, she has used this grabber many many times to retrieve her small beads from the floor. It has come in very handy!! I absolutely recommend this particular grabber. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LifesADance

customer_reviews.title: A big fat yes if you need just a little more reach.
customer_reviews.text: It gave me that extra reach that I needed, I don't care for the thin rubber that wore off it makes flat items about the width of a nickel or a cell phone hard to pick up but besides that I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: gussie johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This gripper is just what I needed to help me pick up items on the floor or other low surfaces. It's easy to use, lightweight, and works like a charm. I can easily pick up any item, including those that are small. The gripper grips items securely, and the trigger handle is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: techrighter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I bought it while I was pregnant because I couldn’t reach most things due to my belly. I still have to use this to get clothes out of my washing machine because I’m short and the washer is extra deep. It is good quality and still holding up. It can pick up a good bit of wet laundry. I’m pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Melton

customer_reviews.title: I can pick up a pill from the floor, so helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Love my gripper, I am recovering from surgery and it’s been so helpful, I use it constantly throughout the day. Just wish it had a magnetic tip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, multifunction grabber
customer_reviews.text: This grabber is strong and sturdy, so I am able to safely pick up larger objects than I could with my smaller grabber. The rotating head makes it very versatile so it picks up almost anything. I am currently using it only in the house but it should be even more valuable for working outside come spring. It arrived quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these grabbers! I can pick up tiny things to large things with no difficulty. Tonight I was able to pick up my clock radio that had fallen behind the dresser. I was impressed! So far it’s everything I wanted it to be! And it seem quite sturdy too. I’m Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Girl

customer_reviews.title: Used it for a week and so far it works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pick up garbage on the beach during my walks and it works great. But I did noticed that the two rivets used to hold the handle together are already rusted (after 1 week) and the plastic wrap around the shaft is coming off in strips already. Neither of these items effect the performance
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: ... grabbers before from a box store and was always disappointed because they didn't pick up heave or thin objects
customer_reviews.text: I have balance problems and I have bought grabbers before from a box store and was always disappointed because they didn't pick up heave or thin objects. I tried this grabber and was happy with it. I does pick up papers as well as heavy objects. Well made i'm going to order another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: patricia woods

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have purchased. I have one at work, and two at home. If you need to pick something up off the floor and you have issues (getting less young) this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grips tight.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this grabber. At only 5' 3" tall, there are a lot of shelves beyond my reach and I was tired of dragging a chair around (and then having to climb up on it) to reach my upper cupboards. This does the job nicely. I've been able to lift items up to a pound off the top shelf without dropping them. The handle grip is easy to use and I really like the swivel head. I may buy a second one to keep in my craft or laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Soule

customer_reviews.title: It is just the tool to get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Quality, well built product at a reasonable price. If you have problems that limit your ability to pick things up from the floor, this grabber is a life saver. The curved shape of the grabber allows you to grab cans or bottles. The soft rubber lining ensures a positive grip.
customer_reviews.author: Briarcreekguy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Had a different brand before that eventually broke. This one is alot sturdier, and has a better grip.It also picked up smaller items easier. A little more money, but we'll worth it.
customer_reviews.author: chuckles

customer_reviews.title: The Grabber Reacher is perfect. I ordered it when I-had knee replacement surgery ...
customer_reviews.text: The Grabber Reacher is perfect. I ordered it when I-had knee replacement surgery and it is exactly what I need. I can reach my slippers, clothes or almost anythin
customer_reviews.author: Susan Crow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very well built. Nice and sturdy. Not as heavy as I thought it would be. Good rubber grip ends. Will certainly help my wife grab things off the floor. Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Craven jr

customer_reviews.title: Good tight grip
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a three week series of spinal injections, and was told I could not bend for three plus weeks. Think about how many things you drop, pick up, open bottom drawer, the last item in the dryer the list goes on and on. This device was a true blessing. Saved my sanity. It is light weight, has a good grip and Yes, I actually did have to pick up a dime. YES, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The yellow trigger lever broke off on the second use. Looked great and durable when I ordered it, but very flimsy and cheap. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: G.W. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing that I can pick up fairly heavy items like glass bowls that raccoons knock off of our porch through a small opening. I can easily life them up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong, reliable, well made reacher. This is no namby pamby pincer like the others I've bought, this is the real deal. Had last one for over a year and it never let me down but physical therapist ran off with it. It's so good, others will try to take it for their own.
customer_reviews.author: JB5

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a daily tool I use to pick up toys and random objects around the house. I don’t use for heavy stuff like jars because common sense will let you know or to mess up your wrist. It’s also great for small-tiny stuff like a coin or a pill.
customer_reviews.author: Zuleyka

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t function without a grabber
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality grabber but I find it a bit too long for me. I use an 18” size by Handi-Grip probably 10-15 times a day. The smaller size is much easier to manuever.
customer_reviews.author: Gilded Lily

customer_reviews.title: Works great. She uses it daily
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 90 year old mother with arthritis. Works great. She uses it daily. Good quality easy to pull trigger and holds a good grip when picking things up
customer_reviews.author: Edward knebl

customer_reviews.title: STRONG GRIP
customer_reviews.text: BEST GRIP BY FAR. CAN SET DOWN AND PICK UP SMALL CERAMIC PLATES AND BOWLS FROM THE FLOOR. AND THAT MAKES MY CATS HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: pw

customer_reviews.title: however I drive a truck that is pretty high off the ground
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for use around my house, however I drive a truck that is pretty high off the ground. Getting into the truck has gotten harder so I purchased a little foot stool. Now I just had to figure out how to get the foot stool into the truck viola the Handi Grip! I am able to get in the truck then reach down and grasp the handle on the collapsable stool and lift it into the truck. It works so well that I will be purchasing two more one for the house and one for work. The one I have will stay in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Ruyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for picking up trash in our neighborhood. The gripper is so precise that I can even pick up small shards of broken glass and it doesn't drop them if I lose my grip a little on the trigger when I move trash from the ground to the bag/bucket.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Grabs large and small items
customer_reviews.text: I am temporarily mobility impaired with degenerative joint disease in my legs and cannot bend more than 90 degrees at the hips. Without this grabber My ability to accomplish household chores would be greatly diminushed. The grabber is tough and strong yet it picks up even small items with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Alice McPhee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed in my craft area to pick up dropped items. Light weight. Long reach. Excellent for anybody needing to pick up or reach items. Great price. Quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile grabber
customer_reviews.text: It’s great that it has soft rubber grabbers. I can pick up paper from the floor. And it’s so strong that I’ve even done laundry with it. I can unload the wet laundry from the washer and put it in the dryer and then take the dried laundry out of the dryer. I can do it all without bending it over. I had major back surgery and it’s been my huge helper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short people helper
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much I bought a second one. Terrific help for high reaching cupboards!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline M. Moll

customer_reviews.title: Great  Reacher/Grabber! 😃
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good reacher/grabber! It's definitely the best one I've used in the 16 years I've been disabled to date. It works as advertised and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Creel

customer_reviews.title: A great grabber
customer_reviews.text: Bending over is over-rated. This little beauty will grab stuff off the ground, big and small. Snaps up twigs in the yard like a champ. Also good for reaching high-up stuff (we have to the ceiling kitchen cabinets). Versatile--the grabbing head rotates. May start taking it on walks to pick up trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Slatta

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than what you can buy at Walmart and more grip
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed when I had a hip replacement. It saved me so much pain by being able to help myself to get dressed and whatever I dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Reaches those places that I can not!
customer_reviews.text: This makes a big difference in my day. I even use it to reach the back of the (huge) washer/dryer set. It grips securely and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: CYNDYLU

customer_reviews.title: BEST GRABBER EVER
customer_reviews.text: I loved it because it actually works. I’ve purchased so many of this type of unit when I had a hip replacement & they didn’t work. Sure didn’t pick up a dime.
customer_reviews.author: PJS1957

customer_reviews.title: Most helpful
customer_reviews.text: This product is study and well made. Makes it easy to reach things easily and securely. I was even able to pick up a piece of string, under a table, first try.
customer_reviews.author: carsong

customer_reviews.title: The best so far.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a couple of these grabbers and this one, so far, is the best one. I can pick a Q-Tip from the floor with it without much hassle. It’s that good. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JMV

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy grabber, will pick up better than others I have had.
customer_reviews.text: These grabbers are very sturdy, I use one every day for many items around the house, would recommend these as pick up better than others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Luetta Weir

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is a joy. Ever tried to reach way under a bed or get something from a very high shelf? This grabber can grip even a tiny pill. It is sturdy and easy to use. We bought a plastic clip also which allows it to fasten to the bar on a walker and makes it readily available for use.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. As described.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved me many hours of work by helping clean up in the yard and getting things I can not reach (I'm short) It's nice and sturdy and one of the best one's I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Klaben

customer_reviews.title: ... saw these on Amazon tried them out they work great and they will pick up a dime had stroke ...
customer_reviews.text: My other set wore out saw these on Amazon tried them out they work great and they will pick up a dime had stroke awhile back use to pick up around house real handy so far better then ones I bought at home depot
customer_reviews.author: David fretz

customer_reviews.title: This grabber solved my problem.
customer_reviews.text: I use a grabber to pickup the balls that I throw for my German Shepherds. The grabbers had small suction cups on the ends. My younger dog would try to get the ball as I picked it up. In doing so, she would break off the suction cups rendering the grabber useless. This grabber does not have the suction cups, so my problem is solved!
customer_reviews.author: FME

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Don't expect it to pick up a bowling ball, Or a coffee table book. But for lighter weighted objects, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Shell

customer_reviews.title: The grabber works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time bending to the ground without pain and this has made it so much easier. Picks up even little items that I have dropped. Would recommend. I purchased two of these in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sam_Adams

customer_reviews.title: Overall like this item
customer_reviews.text: Very handy tool when one is limited. Used it outside to pull weeds out of moist soil. Won’t hold on to tree seedlings that find there way into my flower beds. Overall like this item.
customer_reviews.author: fiona224

customer_reviews.title: So glad I tried this.
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is great. I'm very arthritic and have difficulty stooping down to pick things up so this has saved me much pain and discomfort. It grabs securely and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Maxim

customer_reviews.title: A must for anyone. Handy to have around the house.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I recently had a hip replacement and knew my moving around would be somewhat limited so I purchased this reacher. It has been so handy for me around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for doing trash pick up
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this grabber (and one of the 26" ones) for a community trash pick up event and it worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff M.

customer_reviews.title: Strong grabber.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this grabber does not fold in half. All of my previous grabbers folded and that folding spot was where they always broke. This one feels strong. I think this will last me a long time
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Grips good, spreads good
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything. I had cataract surgery and told not to bend over. My dog doesnt understand so with this I can pick up balls or frisbees.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Christo

customer_reviews.title: Most helpful item purchased
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful in every day life picking up items, reaching, putting on socks and shoes etc...
customer_reviews.author: JayNay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grabber for anyone unable to bend down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 32" grabber with rotating head for my mother who fell and broke several bones. She is unable to bend down to pick up anything per doctors orders and so she needed something to aid her in retrieving any item dropped on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Ater trying several grabbers this is by far the best I've ever owned. I will be ordering at least 2 more for convenience in the other rooms of my home.
customer_reviews.author: KrissiB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing for my husband after his back surgery. He cant bend over and this has really worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy McDonough

customer_reviews.title: only thing is the screws got rusty and the Clippers get a bit stuck when getting very wet but are fine after it dries
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful. I use this in my fish tank to help me move things around so I don't need to stick my hands in every time. only thing is the screws got rusty and the Clippers get a bit stuck when getting very wet but are fine after it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Chaim L.

customer_reviews.title: Not For Picking Up Heavier Objects
customer_reviews.text: My reachers started breaking when I picked up an object that weighed on about 5lbs. Forget trying to pick up bigger canned goods overhead. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: MusicMike

product_meta.title: 32" Handi Grip Reacher with Rotating Head (Yellow)
feature_bullets: Head rotates 90 degrees to reach from any angle
Flexible finger - like tip allows for picking up the smallest of items
Ergonomic handle provides a very comfortable grip
Use to reach items behind things or out of reach
Limited Lifetime Warranty and 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
